author: MohitS704
body:
It was conveyed to the off-shell team **today** that we need _yet another_ backport to the CMSSW_12_4_X series in order to centrally produce and shower 2022 samples for Run 3.

So, in the same vein as the [original PR](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45344), the [first backport](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46856), and the [second backport](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/47057), we are backporting the MCMultiParticleMassFilter to CMSSW, this time for the 12_4_X series.
title: Backporting MC Filter to CMSSW_12_4_X series for Run3 2022 production
